gambling.error.max: You're only allowed to gamble a maximum amount of $1.
gambling.error.min: You're only allowed to gamble a minimum amount of $1.
gambling.set.max: Set the maximum gambling amount to $1!
gambling.win.range: Set gambling win range to $1-100 lose range to 1-$2
gambling.allowwhenoffline.enabled: Gambling is allowed while channel is offline.
gambling.allowwhenoffline.disabled: Gambling is prevented while channel is offline.
